lst.name: sentence
lst.str: With the elimination in 1983 of regulations that had drawn strict lines between savings and loans and commercial banks, the gap widened to as much as 50 to 75 basis points as wary depositors demanded a higher premium to place their funds in thrift institutions, Fairbanks said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Administration's 15 billion dlr plan to recapitalize the Federal Savings and Loan Insurance Corporation is needed to ensure the future profitablity of the U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Fairbanks said that the public's confidence in thrift instititutions eroded with the financial difficulties of savings and loan associations in Ohio and Maryland in 1985.
